dare: Take an embarrassing selfie and post it as your profile picture.
Fill your mouth with water, and each person in the group must tell the funniest joke they know. If you spit up the water, you have to eat a spoonful of dirt.
Until the next round, talk super loud, like nobody can hear you.
Laugh like a mad person
Lick the bottom of your shoe.
Let the group pose you in an embarrassing position and take a picture.
Let the group look through your phone for 2 minutes.
Talk in a strange accent for the rest of the night.
Call the 7th contact in your phone and sing them 30 seconds of a song that the group chooses.
Give A Massage To A Companion For 5 Minutes.
Talk without closing your mouth.
Get into a debate with a wall.
Be someone’s pet for the next 5 minutes.
Attempt to break dance for 30 seconds.
Yell and act out the first sentence that comes to your mind
Sniff the armpits of everyone in the room.
Beg and plead the person to your right not to leave you for that other boy or girl. Weeping, gnashing of teeth, and wailing is encouraged.
Seduce a member of the same gender in the group.
Go to the bathroom, take off your underwear and put it on your head. Wear it on your head for the rest of the game.
Close your eyes and send a blind text to a random person
Exchange a clothing item with the player on your right
Show everything that’s in your purse
Go to the next room and ask your neighbor for bananas
Lick someone’s foot 2 times.
Gaze into a girl’s or boy’s eyes for 30 seconds.
Slow dance to a fast song.
Hop like a kangaroo for a minute and cover the entire room.
Send a text message to your crash, telling them your feet usually smell like rotten tomatoes and ask if they would put up with that.
Tell the group in details about your first kiss.
Reveal the color of your boxers/panties.
Go back and forth under the table until it’s your turn again.
Call 5 different people and talk to them in 5 different accents.
Drink 3 big cups of water without stopping.
Tell your girlfriend/boyfriend that your friends don’t like her/him so you can’t be with her/him anymore.
